what: Proficiency Quizzes for R for Data Science (2e)
title: Proficiency Quizzes for R for Data Science (2e)
text: r4dsQuizzes provides quizzes R Data Science (2e) Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, Garrett Grolemund. interactive quizzes made using learnr tutorials exam adaptations tutorialExtras. goal r4dsQuizzes provide proficiency assessment student mastery mind. quiz run, set questions randomly selected student complete. end quiz student lock quiz, download html answers, upload html learning management system. 24 hours, ‘retry button’ become active student able take quiz new set questions randomly selected. quiz allows 3 attempts. time exercises auto-graded need graded instructor grader often many ways accomplish exercise goal. Ideally, student provided feedback attempt, however large class, resources may limit ability might consider student submit attempt like graded.

title: Proficiency Quizzes for R for Data Science (2e)
text: Install latest version r4dsQuizzes GitHub remotes package. {r} # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("NUstat/r4dsQuizzes", dependencies = TRUE)

title: Proficiency Quizzes for R for Data Science (2e)
text: two ways run tutorials. recommended way run tutorial type following line R console: learnr::run_tutorial("quiz-1", package = "r4dsQuizzes") bring tutorial default web browser. can see full list tutorials running: learnr::run_tutorial(package = "r4dsQuizzes") Alternatively, Version 1.3 onwards executed library(r4dsQuizzes), list tutorials appears tutorial tab (default upper-right pane). However, print option executable tutorial run tutorial tab.

title: Proficiency Quizzes for R for Data Science (2e)
text: completing quiz, students can obtain quiz html format. Students can upload html learning management system like Canvas Gradescope.
